page.title: 12OLD EASTCOTE
page.content: In Joel street there's a place called Flag cottage.It's name comes from the flag it used to fly during World War1. It was first called Spring cottage when it was a private school in the years before 1914.It dates back to the 18th century.In the 19th century many Eastcote houses were farmland.now a lot of the old houses don't have farmland.Now the farmland is a number of roads or council estates.Farms which are now old buildings are:Fore Street Farm, Fore St,Park farm and Field End Farm ,Field End Rd and Cuckoo Farm,Cuckoo Hill Rd.Haydon Hall Farm in Joel St.,now called Farmlands,is now a council estate. Cheney St. Farm in Cheney St. is now an estate of bungalows.Even though many farms have sold their land Joel St. Farm, Joel St. has retained its land and is a working farm.
